mil7.8.1:1.1: “Bhante nāgasena, ‘kumbhassa ekaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabban’ti yaṁ vadesi, katamaṁ taṁ ekaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabban”ti?
mil7.8.1:1.3: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena āgame adhigame pariyattiyaṁ sāmaññe pāramiṁ patvā na saṇitabbaṁ, na tena māno karaṇīyo, na dabbo dassetabbo, nihatamānena nihatadabbena bhavitabbaṁ, ujukena amukharena avikatthinā.
mil7.8.1:1.4: Idaṁ, mahārāja, kumbhassa ekaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabbaṁ.
